channel.title: One little thing: Experienced Programmers Only Please!
channel.description:
It's simple, I'm looking for the method to play music, I know how to implement it and whatever, I just need the method.
I don't need the the method to play action sounds, I already have that method! [b]I would like the one for music please![/b]

item.title: One little thing: Experienced Programmers Only Please!
item.dc:creator: @Clawz_fury lare69
item.description:
@Clawz_fury wrote:

[quote=“I Vain I”]So you are going to need to stream the music data to the client.

Give me some time to think the best way through this.

Now is this for Delta, Pi, or what?[/quote]

Yup, and Delta.

Read full topic
item.source: One little thing: Experienced Programmers Only Please!

item.title: One little thing: Experienced Programmers Only Please!
item.dc:creator: @Clawz_fury lare69
item.description:
@Clawz_fury wrote:

[quote=“I Vain I”]I believe you’re looking for the server sided code, and your client is already set up to play the music?

Are you going to be storing the music server sided, or client sided?[/quote]

Server sided, and I think my client is already set up to play music.

Read full topic
item.source: One little thing: Experienced Programmers Only Please!
